item.title: Cheney’s funeral draws Bush, mix of Democrats and Republicans. Not Trump.
item.description: The former vice president, who served in the George W. Bush administration, was honored Thursday at Washington National Cathedral.

item.title: Trump: Democrats ‘traitors’ for telling military not to follow unlawful orders
item.description: The president said lawmakers who appeared in a video committed “seditious behavior” and should be arrested and put on trial for treason.

item.title: White House defends Trump calling female reporter ‘Piggy’
item.description: The president has escalated his attacks on the press amid political blowback for his handling of files related to deceased sex offender Jeffrey Epstei...

item.title: U.S. Coast Guard will no longer classify swastikas, nooses as hate symbols
item.description: The military service, which falls under the Department of Homeland Security, has drafted a new policy that classifies such items “potentially divisive...

item.title: As Trump plans backfire, Democrats are ahead in House redistricting fight
item.description: After early redistricting wins, Trump faces setbacks over maps for Texas, Indiana and other Republican-led states, frustrating his allies.
